participant_2.background:
I don't have a car but I do enjoy riding my bike.
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
I'm from LA, and I like to wear comfortable clothes because I'm always on the go.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Hi! I'm just relaxing at home. How about you?
I'm going to visit my mom and have her cook me a delicious meal.
That sounds amazing! I love home cooked meals.
Me too! I have a busy weekend ahead of me. My weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of work!
It is, but it's worth it to help my clients.
I'm sure it is! I'm impressed with your work ethic.
Thanks! I appreciate that. My most interesting experience was when I met a famous person who was a passenger in one of my cabs.
That's so cool! What was that like?
It was amazing! I was so excited to meet them.
I bet you were! That's a great story.
Thanks! I'm glad I got to share it with you
